# Privacy-Enhanced Mail?

## Description

Extract the private key _d_ as a decimal integer from this PEM-formatted RSA key.

**Challenge files:**\
\- [privacy\_enhanced\_mail.pem](https://cryptohack.org/static/challenges/privacy\_enhanced\_mail\_1f696c053d76a78c2c531bb013a92d4a.pem)

## Solution

The `cryptography` package in python provides a tool to read `.pem` file by using `RSA.importKey()`.

## Flag

```txt

```
